review.title: “Great environment, relaxed”
review.pros: Pros – Owner and managers are great and easy to work with, potential to make lots of $. My first year I made 6 figures with no experience
review.cons: Cons – Commission only sales job. Economy really hit the industry hard, I went from making 6 figs the first yr, down to 20k the second year, and its slowly coming back, year 3 was about 40k
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Management is awesome, the only thing I would ask for is more leads and since sales have taken such a hit with the economy, a higher commission rate to make up for it would be nice.
